entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Shaunavon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 10 except minus 6 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10 except minus 6 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
